title: Check for Domain Name Availability
description: For a new product launch, a brand manager needs to see if a desired domain name is available.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the name to be checked (e.g., 'newproduct.com').

tasks.description: Use a domain registrar's WHOIS lookup tool to check the availability of the domain.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the domain is already registered.

tasks.description: Brainstorm alternative domain names or TLDs (e.g., '.io', '.co') and check their availability.
